analysis.description: AddressUtils.isContract (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#152-160) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721Basic (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#73-95) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#82)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#88-89)

DeprecatedERC721 (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#130-139) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):

ERC721BasicToken (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#245-513) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):

	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#380-385)

CrystalBase.getCrystalsByKind (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#876-881) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _crystal.kind == _kind
index in CrystalBase.getCrystalsByKind (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol) is a local variable never initialiazed

CrystalBase.getCrystal.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#825) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#11-14)

AddressUtils.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/9/0xcfbc9103362aec4ce3089f155c2da2eea1cb7602.sol#152-160)
